A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I preface this with\, I LOVE Star Wars! But TLJ is by far\, the worst Star Wars movie ever! Plot holes\, poor writing\, poor editing\, no meaningful relationships\, and no character development. Kylo Ren is easily the worst villain ever- like a pouty teenager meets every cliche B-movie bad guy. He and Leia didn't even have a single interaction. The big reveal for Rae's parents was stupid. Even the fake looking birds and fake looking crystal dogs were sub-par for Star Wars standards. Stoke was a cartoon version of the emperor and he went down like a wet fish. Leia floating in space and was dumb because it led to nothing. Luke's story was most disappointing. Not epic-more like an epic fail!
